item.title: Resfusion: Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models for Image Restoration Based on Prior Residual Noise
item.description: Resfusion, a novel framework, accelerates image restoration by integrating residual noise into the diffusion process, achieving superior results with fewer steps.
